scripts.commit: rimraf dist && babel --config-file @dword-design/babel-config --copy-files --no-copy-ignored --out-dir dist --ignore "**/*.spec.js" src && node dist/cli.js commit
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && babel --config-file @dword-design/babel-config --copy-files --no-copy-ignored --out-dir dist --ignore "**/*.spec.js" src && node dist/cli.js dev
scripts.lint: rimraf dist && babel --config-file @dword-design/babel-config --copy-files --no-copy-ignored --out-dir dist --ignore "**/*.spec.js" src && node dist/cli.js lint
scripts.prepare: rimraf dist && babel --config-file @dword-design/babel-config --copy-files --no-copy-ignored --out-dir dist --ignore "**/*.spec.js" src && node dist/cli.js prepare
scripts.prepublishOnly: rimraf dist && babel --config-file @dword-design/babel-config --copy-files --no-copy-ignored --out-dir dist --ignore "**/*.spec.js" src && node dist/cli.js prepublishOnly
scripts.test: rimraf dist && babel --config-file @dword-design/babel-config --copy-files --no-copy-ignored --out-dir dist --ignore "**/*.spec.js" src && node dist/cli.js test
